mapper.insert: insert into T_OPERATION (ID, UUID, OPERATION, OTIME, DESCRIPTION) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{otime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select ID, UUID, OPERATION, OTIME, DESCRIPTION from T_OPERATION
